name: Cookie Clicker Advanced
description:
We Recommend Downloading the Itch.io app and The Primal Game Launcher

Cookie Clicker Advanced is a cookie clicking game but advanced.

Notices!!

We recommend downloading the Itch.io app for future updates and The Primal Game Launcher to make it easier for you to launch the game. You do have the option to not Download the Primal Game Launcher but this choice might give problems in the future because we plan on making some updates and games exclusive to the launcher. 

Primal Launcher Download Link: https://emperorgaming.itch.io/primal-game-launcher 

Future Updates:

Update 1.2: This update will contain custom background images and a goal for you to get an higher score every time you play. These background images will be available on my Artstation for free.

Artsation: https://www.artstation.com/aiden_snyders
